name: Browser Media Keys
description: Hit pause/play, previous/next, and other shortcuts from outside your browser

mediaPlayPause.description: Send a 'play/pause' command to any active media sites

mediaStop.description: Send a 'stop' command to any active media sites

mediaPrevTrack.description: Send a 'previous track' command to any active media sites

mediaNextTrack.description: Send a 'next track' command to any active media sites
